elements.name: panel4
elements.title: Read the following text and then read through the possible answers. Judge which level of communication the answers most likely belong to.

elements.name: question1
rows: No, I'm not going to finish it now.
I normally take on extra work without any problems, but today of all days I've taken on something that's important to me.
You always come at the last minute! That's not right.
I'm annoyed because it's messing up my plans.
Give me a compliment, otherwise I'll leave you alone with the work.
Since when do you actually decide when I finish work - it's getting that far!
elements.title: Store. Saturday, 4.30 pm. The retail employee is actually off work now. She is packing up her personal belongings. Her boss comes in and asks her to finish some urgent work. The retail employee replies: "Oh no, today of all days, that doesn't suit me today!" The employee could have answered differently. Read through the possible answers and assess which level of communication the answers most likely belong to.
